Many with TS experience additional neurobehavioral problems including inattention, hyperactivity and impulsivity, and obsessive-compulsive symptoms such as intrusive thoughts/worries and repetitive behaviors.",NINDS,Tourette Syndrome
What are the treatments for Tourette Syndrome ?,"Because tic symptoms do not often cause impairment, the majority of people with TS require no medication
